nodes.documentation:
Set the current MonkeyContract address and initialize the instance of Monkeycontract.
Requirement: Only the contract owner can call.
nodes.name: setMonkeyContract

nodes.documentation: Get the details about a offer for _tokenId. Throws an error if there is no active offer for _tokenId.
nodes.name: getOffer

nodes.documentation: Get all tokenId's that are currently for sale. Returns an empty arror if none exist.
nodes.name: getAllTokenOnSale

nodes.documentation:
test next, implemented
Creates a new offer for _tokenId for the price _price.
Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Create offer"
Requirement: Only the owner of _tokenId can create an offer.
Requirement: There can only be one active offer for a token at a time.
Requirement: Marketplace contract (this) needs to be an approved operator when the offer is created.
nodes.name: setOffer

nodes.documentation:
test next, implemented
Removes an existing offer.
Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Remove offer"
Requirement: Only the seller of _tokenId can remove an offer.
nodes.name: removeOffer

nodes.documentation:
Executes the purchase of _tokenId.
Sends the funds to the seller and transfers the token using transferFrom in Monkeycontract.
Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Buy".
Requirement: The msg.value needs to equal the price of _tokenId
Requirement: There must be an active offer for _tokenId
nodes.name: buyMonkey

nodes.documentation:
Set the current MonkeyContract address and initialize the instance of Monkeycontract.
Requirement: Only the contract owner can call.
nodes.name: setMonkeyContract

nodes.documentation: Get the details about a offer for _tokenId. Throws an error if there is no active offer for _tokenId.
nodes.name: getOffer

nodes.documentation: Get all tokenId's that are currently for sale. Returns an empty arror if none exist.
nodes.name: getAllTokenOnSale

nodes.documentation:
test next, implemented
Creates a new offer for _tokenId for the price _price.
Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Create offer"
Requirement: Only the owner of _tokenId can create an offer.
Requirement: There can only be one active offer for a token at a time.
Requirement: Marketplace contract (this) needs to be an approved operator when the offer is created.
nodes.name: setOffer

test next, implemented
Removes an existing offer.
Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Remove offer"

nodes.name: removeOffer

nodes.documentation:
Executes the purchase of _tokenId.
Sends the funds to the seller and transfers the token using transferFrom in Monkeycontract.
Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Buy".
Requirement: The msg.value needs to equal the price of _tokenId
Requirement: There must be an active offer for _tokenId
nodes.name: buyMonkey

buyMonkey(uint256).notice: Executes the purchase of _tokenId. Sends the funds to the seller and transfers the token using transferFrom in Monkeycontract. Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Buy". Requirement: The msg.value needs to equal the price of _tokenId Requirement: There must be an active offer for _tokenId

getAllTokenOnSale().notice: Get all tokenId's that are currently for sale. Returns an empty arror if none exist.

getOffer(uint256).notice: Get the details about a offer for _tokenId. Throws an error if there is no active offer for _tokenId.

removeOffer(uint256).notice: test next, implemented Removes an existing offer. Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Remove offer" Requirement: Only the seller of _tokenId can remove an offer.

setMonkeyContract(address).notice: Set the current MonkeyContract address and initialize the instance of Monkeycontract. Requirement: Only the contract owner can call.

setOffer(uint256,uint256).notice: test next, implemented Creates a new offer for _tokenId for the price _price. Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Create offer" Requirement: Only the owner of _tokenId can create an offer. Requirement: There can only be one active offer for a token at a time. Requirement: Marketplace contract (this) needs to be an approved operator when the offer is created.
